name: Life Loop
description:
My entry for the Ludum Dare 47 Game Jam where the theme is "Stuck in a loop"

Life Loop is about the repeated work life and how time passes seemingly out of 

nowhere.

Controls: 

Move Left: A or LEFT

Move Right: D or RIGHT

Interact: W or UP

Mini Jump: S or DOWN

Colour Palette used:

Music sourced from Opengameart.org
